name: bun-types
description: Type definitions and documentation for Bun, an incredibly fast JavaScript runtime

scripts.copy-docs: rm -rf docs && cp -rL ../../docs/ ./docs && find ./docs -type f -name '*.md' -exec sed -i 's/\$BUN_LATEST_VERSION/'"${BUN_VERSION#bun-v}"'/g' {} +
scripts.build: bun run copy-docs && cp ../../src/init/rule.md CLAUDE.md && bun scripts/build.ts
